channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minister defends David Lammy and says ‘broken system’ to blame for prisoner releases – UK politics live
item.description: Steve Reed says the way to fix the issue ‘is not tittle tattle about David Lammy in the newspapers’ Rachel Reeves has unnecessarily blocked her option...

item.title: China’s latest aircraft carrier enters service to extend reach into high seas
item.description: Experts say hi-tech Fujian will help expand country’s military influence and reach farther beyond its own waters China’s newest and most advanced airc...

item.title: Passengers face global disruption as flights cut amid US government shutdown
item.description: Travellers forced to adjust their plans as longest shutdown on record continues with no sign of a resolution A US government order to make drastic cut...

item.title: EU tightens rules on visas for Russians amid ongoing Ukraine aggression – Europe live
item.description: Russian nationals will no longer be able to receive multiple-entry visas, and have to apply individually every time they plan to travel to the EU The ...

item.title: Flight cancellations take effect amid government shutdown – US politics live
item.description: Airlines had already started cutting services ahead of today’s 6am ET directive to reduce traffic at 40 major airports A federal judge in Rhode Island...

item.title: Bellingham and Foden recalled to England squad
item.description: Thomas Tuchel also hands a first call-up to Bournemouth midfielder Alex Scott, with England having already qualified for the World Cup.

item.title: Two arrests after baby killed in XL bully dog attack
item.description: The nine-month-old baby boy died at the scene in south-east Wales on Sunday evening.

item.title: 'Arsenal attack like the 'Invincibles' and defend like class of 97-98'
item.description: They have won nothing yet, but this Arsenal side reminds me of the ones I won three league titles with, writes Martin Keown.

item.title: ITV in talks to sell television business to Sky
item.description: The talks focus on ITV's free-to-air channels as well as its streaming service, ITV X.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 delayed again until November 2026
item.description: The most anticipated video game of all time receives a second official delay from makers Rockstar Games.
